titleStmt.title: Act for setling [sic] the orders in the Parliament-House. At Edinburgh the 13. of May 1662 years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Imperfect: creased and stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
